item.title: Windows Subsystem for Linux
item.description: As a developer, you always wanted to have Ubuntu running on your machine but then you either end up installing it as dual boot or as a Virtualbox after spending lot of time. What if you get ubuntu as inbuild application inside Windows10 itself. This article will show you how to install Ubuntu on your windows 10 using Windows subsystem for Linux. It is advised to use WSL 2 to have better performance and support for most of Linux features.
